name: Don't Zone Out
description:
Controls

Use the mouse to click the tiles you wish to select. Tutorial included

How to play

Quickly memorise the board, and then select the ones you remember. Don't make a mistake.

Details

Don't Zone Out was developed in 48 hours for the GM48 Jam, with the theme 60 seconds. It is now under regular development.

Roadmap

The plan is to release the game for free in Singleplayer mode, but multiplayer Coop and Versus will be £1.99. Only the host has to have the full version.
